Halfway there! (v0.5 released) 11/04/2013

This release will probably never reach public consumption, but it is the next major milestone.

Features:

* All new updated stats, based on the work of a team of contributors * New advice metrics

This will be beta tested by our group again to refine the advice generation, and then we should have a v1.0!
